Mikler wrote:

> is it a bad manner not to re-create all the database just before each
> testCase?

For testing with a database, I recommend recreate test data for each 
test case. Recreating the database is only one way to achieve this.

Because of this, I reduce the number of tests that require the actual 
database. I wrote about this extensively in _JUnit Recipes_, chapter 10.

Good luck.
